name: Units Converter EM
description: Convert Metric to Standards Units and vice versa.

system-settings.name:
Description

This EM will allow you to convert fields values based on the their type. Currently the EM support following type:
  • Length
  • Weight

To define converter

In field notes you need to define [CONVERSION_TYPE]=[CONVERSION_UNIT] for example: weight=pound, length=inch(please note you need to define full unit name instead of abbreviation)
